page.title: 07SPORTS AND RECREATION
page.content:
Our school,Firshill Middle, is to the north of Sheffield. The nearest{sports {centre}is Concorde at Shiregreen, where our school goes swimming. In our area there are{swimming baths}at Upperthorpe, Sheaf Valley, Hillsborough and the University.
Sheffield has a lot of{parks.}Our local park is Abbeyfield Park. You can play tennis, bowls and putting. There are swings, a slide, and a roundabout for children. Near our school is an adventure playground.
There is{a running track}at one end of Hillsborough Park which we use for athletic competitions. Weston Park has a{boating lake.
